title: Attitude Studio Steampunk Time Traveler Goggles Top Hat, Novelty Costume - Gold
features: REALISTIC STEAMPUNK ACCESSORIES - Gold Stove Top Hat with attached goggles is a versatile steam punk accessory perfect for themed Halloween costume such as cowboy, voodoo witch, plague doctor, circus ringmaster, greatest showman ringleader, zombie Abraham Lincoln, mad scientist, wizard time traveler, renaissance magician, & more! Use this metallic hat decor as party decorations for Day of the Dead parties, or as photo booth props for a wedding or pirate themed birthday.

DECORATIVE COSTUME TOP HATS FOR ADULTS - Great for adults in need of a quick Mardi Gras costume. Pairs perfectly with clothing such as black tuxedo shirt & cane, or with a Victorian corset top & dress skirt. Adult can wear this pirate captain hat to a tea party or a magician's show! Great to accessorize with steam punk necklace jewelry, toy gun & sword, or Victorian wig costumes. Ideal as a magician's head wear or hat mask for time travelers.

STEAM PUNK GOGGLES, GEARS, & TIME TRAVELER DETAILS- Includes 1 Attitude Studio Steampunk Gold Stove Pipe Hat with metallic industrial gears & wires, toy bullets, decorative spiked goggle glasses with plastic lens , metal chains, & pocket watch with glued zipper details. Renaissance voodoo witch hat comes in one size & fits most adult heads. Gold stove top hat size is approximately 12" x 10" on the outside, & head opening size is approx 6.5" x 7.5". Makes a unique sombrero!

DURABLE, COMFORTABLE COSTUME PARTY ACCESSORY - Hats are made with strong & durable plastic & fabric materials for a lightweight, yet long lasting western hat. Textured fabric makes it look & feel like a velvet felt hat & is comfortable enough to wear on your head for the entire day. Steampunk top hat for adults has an overall rustic Gold finish for the complete Victorian plague doctor costume look. Novelty pirate, magician & cowboy costume hat is made to be safely used by adults.
